} EdgeList;

// Heap element structure

    int degree;
    int node;
} HeapElement;

// Function prototypes
void add_edge(EdgeList *edges, int a, int b);
void heap_push(HeapElement *heap, int *heap_size, HeapElement elem);
HeapElement heap_pop(HeapElement *heap, int *heap_size);
int compare(HeapElement a, HeapElement b);

    int N, M;
    scanf("%d %d", &N, &M);

    EdgeList *edges = malloc(N * sizeof(EdgeList));
    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
        edges[i].list = malloc(16 * sizeof(int));
        edges[i].size = 0;
        edges[i].capacity = 16;
    }

    int *degs = calloc(N, sizeof(int));
    int *parity = calloc(N, sizeof(int));
    bool *flag = calloc(N, sizeof(bool));

    for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
        int a, b;

        a--;
        b--;
        add_edge(edges, a, b);
        add_edge(edges, b, a);
        degs[a]++;
        degs[b]++;

    }

                buffer1_len += len;

                buffer1_len += len;
